response.skills: Computer Simulations, Product Customization, Finite Element Analysis (FEA), Technical Documentation, Computer-Aided Design (CAD), Slack, Gitlab, ClickUp, SOLIDWORKS, MATLAB, CATIA, Siemens NX, Ansys Products, STAAD-Pro, Autodesk Inventor, Solid Edge, Microsoft Excel, Teamcenter, Scrum, Technical Sales Support

profile_positions.description:
- Updates, development plans and Bug-fix reporting
- Planning, execution and follow-up for product development:
- Active development and evaluation of development processes
- Managing the product backlog and their prioritization
- Report any changes, troubles and schedules related to product development
- Assure communication: Team, shareholders, and customers
profile_positions.title: Product & production manager

profile_positions.description:
- Collection of product characteristic information for the correct digitization of the product.
- Creation of tasks with product specifications.
- Revision and quality control of tasks according to customer's requirements.
- Parametric and modular product design.
profile_positions.title: Product Owner

profile_positions.description:
- Calculation of strength of metal structures 
- FEM analysis 
- Design of supports for metal structures
- Elaboration of manufacturing drawings
profile_positions.title: Mechanical Engineering Consultant

profile_positions.description:
- Follow up the production processes, tracking the time spent in the execution of each activity.
- Define adequate production indexes to formulate budget estimates for commercial offers.
- Identify opportunities for improvement in the production processes.
- Continuous and effective communication with the manufacturing plant's operative personnel looking to improve production indicators.
- Elaboration of the manufacturing manual for compact boilers. 
- Participation in the design of the production process and devices for manufacturing.
profile_positions.title: Mechanical Engineering Internship | Standardization Assistant

company.name: SSA Digi
company.description:
SSA Digi is a company focused on the business and engineering automation. We have developed Cielo: the most efficient sales and engineering system in the world. Cielo includes Sales Configurators, 3d-engineering software and production control systems - all browser based!

With the Cielo-system you can optimize your company’s order-delivery-chain completely. We are an unique combination of Engineering office and Software company. We have tens of years of experience in Engineering and R&D in construction, metal and machinery industries.

See www.ssadigi.com and www.cielo.fi for more details!

SSA Digi is part of SSA Group - see www.ssa.fi
